name: Let me some space
description:
Let me some space is a game you play a little paper trying to get space to see his fav girl

it was very fun to prototype but too big for the small amount of time (we couln't work on Monday)
[out of scope, buggy]

Control

-WASD to move

-left click to become flat/lift, right click while moving flat to throw

Credits

Karp - Game Design

Anathar - Game Art, Animations

RisuNiku - Game Art, Animations

CallicouJack - Music

Bib - Prog

Narudgi - Game Design, Prog

Thanks to everyone !
